name: Arachnida
description:
Arachnida was supposed to be a full multiplayer game.

Here I want to share my first prototype version as singleplayer

  • BlackWidow Spider can run on all kind of walls.
  • Spider has inverse kinematic legs
  • Spider has basic attributes like hunger thirst stamina and health.
  • Spider can fill up water attribute.
  • Spider can move in 3 different speeds.
  • Spider can attack ants.

More details on my Website: https://walk3r.info/arachnida_warning/
